body.p: In view of the strict criteria for departure from a requirement in an IFRS, IAS 1 includes a rebuttable presumption that if other entities in similar circumstances comply with the requirement, the entity’s compliance with the requirement would not be so misleading that it would conflict with the objective of financial statements set out in the Framework.
